name: Haight-Ashbury Hotel
proximityToAttractions: Located in the heart of the Haight-Ashbury district, just steps away from the iconic Haight-Ashbury intersection.
neighborhoodSafety: The Haight-Ashbury neighborhood is generally safe, but like any urban area, it is recommended to exercise caution and be aware of your surroundings.
accessibility: The hotel is easily accessible by public transportation, with multiple bus lines and a nearby Muni Metro station. Conveniently located near major highways for those arriving by car.
wifi: Complimentary high-speed WiFi available throughout the hotel
climateControl: Individual climate control in each room
recentReview: Wonderful stay at the Haight-Ashbury Hotel. The staff was friendly and accommodating, and the location couldn't be beat. Will definitely be staying here again!
cancellation: Flexible cancellation policy with no penalties within 24 hours of arrival
restaurant: No on-site restaurant, but numerous dining options within walking distance in Haight-Ashbury
familyFriendly: Family-friendly amenities and cribs available upon request
parking: Limited on-site parking available at additional cost. Street parking also available.
specialOffers: Check website for current special offers and promotions
ambianceAndDecor: Quirky and colorful decor reflecting the vibrant Haight-Ashbury culture
businessAmenities: Business center and meeting rooms available
viewAndSurroundings: Some rooms offer views of the Haight-Ashbury neighborhood
noiseLevel: The hotel is located on a relatively quiet street, but some street noise may be heard.
